os.fullpath: Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Android

name: noobdev ROMs
short_description:
This project contains nightly builds of:

CyanogenMod 10.2 with IR support and Xposed Framework.

PAC

Discussion forum: 

A huge thanks goes out to the CyanogenMod and PAC teams for creating awesome open-source Android distributions and also to SourceForge for providing the bandwidth to host these builds!

Finally we would like to thank the Xposed Framework devs!

--

The project is built on the open-source CyanogenMod code. The source code can be found in the git repositories here: https://github.com/CyanogenMod

The IR patches have not yet been merged and are available here: http://review.cyanogenmod.org/#/q/owner:timo%2540tjwendt.de+status:open,n,z

Refreshed patches used in this project and the build scripts are available in my git repository here: https://github.com/chenxiaolong/hudson

Xposed Framework Installer code:
https://github.com/rovo89/XposedInstaller

PAC Source: http://github.com/PAC-man
